Viboo Community Code

Welcome to Viboo, a platform designed to connect people through video chats. To maintain a safe and enjoyable experience for all users, we ask that you follow our community guidelines.

1. Age Requirement
Users must be 18 years or older to use Viboo. Accounts found violating this rule will be permanently suspended.

2. Respectful Behavior
Treat others with kindness and respect during video chats. Bullying, harassment, hate speech, discrimination, and explicit content are strictly prohibited.

3. No Nudity or Sexual Content
Nudity, sexual acts, or sexually suggestive behavior are not allowed. Accounts engaging in such activities will be banned immediately.

4. No Illegal Activities
Illegal behavior, violence, or promoting illegal content is not allowed. This includes the use of drugs, weapons, or any activity that can cause harm.

5. Protect Your Privacy
Do not share personal information, such as phone numbers, addresses, or financial details, during video chats.

6. No Spam or Scams
Spamming or advertising of any kind is strictly prohibited. Users found engaging in scams or fraudulent activity will be banned.

7. Reporting Violations
Use the Report button to report any inappropriate behavior. Our moderation team will review all reports and take appropriate action.

Consequences for Violations
Breaking any of the above rules may result in temporary suspension or permanent ban of your account.

Viboo Terms of Use

Effective Date: January 5, 2025

Welcome to Viboo! By using our app, you agree to comply with the following terms and conditions. Please read them carefully before signing up.

1. Eligibility
You must be 18 years or older to create an account on Viboo. By signing up, you confirm that you meet the age requirement.

2. User Responsibilities
You are responsible for all activity on your account. You agree to use the app for legal purposes and to comply with all applicable laws.

3. Account Termination
Viboo reserves the right to suspend or terminate your account if you violate our terms or guidelines.

4. Paid Plans and Ads
Viboo offers a premium subscription plan to remove ads. By subscribing, you agree to our payment policies and auto-renewal terms.

5. Privacy and Data Collection
By using Viboo, you agree to our Privacy Policy regarding the collection and use of your data.

6. Limitation of Liability
Viboo is not responsible for any offensive or inappropriate content shared by users. We strive to moderate the platform but cannot guarantee a completely safe experience.

7. Changes to Terms
We may update these terms from time to time. Continued use of the app after changes means you accept the updated terms.

Viboo Privacy Notice

Effective Date: January 5, 2025

At Viboo, we are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring that your data is handled securely.

1. Information We Collect
Account Information: Username, email address, and date of birth.
Usage Data: How you interact with the app, including video chat duration, ads viewed, and interactions.
Device Information: Device type, operating system, and IP address.

 2. How We Use Your Information
To provide and improve our services.
To display personalized ads unless you have subscribed to the ad-free plan.
To moderate content and ensure the safety of our users.

 3. Sharing Your Information
We do not share your personal information with third parties, except:

To comply with legal obligations.
To prevent fraud or illegal activities.

 4. Your Rights
You have the right to access, modify, or delete your personal data. You can request to delete your account at any time by contacting our support team.

 5. Data Security
We take reasonable measures to protect your data from unauthorized access. However, no method of transmission over the Internet is 100% secure.

 6. Cookies and Tracking
Viboo uses cookies to enhance your experience and provide personalized ads. You can manage your cookie preferences in your device settings.

 7. Changes to Privacy Policy
We may update this policy from time to time. Continued use of Viboo after changes means you accept the updated policy.
